item.title: How to Create an Exponential Organization and Why You Should Want to placeholder
item.description:
How to Create an Exponential Organization and Why You Should Want to placeholder

In the future of work, you're either the one causing change or you're the one being changed. The most successful companies are the ones that are at the forefront of innovation and disruption, and they are seeing wild growth. How would you like to see 10 times performance improvement of your organization in a year?

item.title: How to Create an Exponential Mindset
item.description:
How to Create an Exponential Mindset

Digital business models are a bit of a misnomer. It's not digital technology that defines them; it's their ability to create exponential value. The music and video industries, for example, weren't redefined by converting analog to digital formats. Just ask Sony about Minidisc players and Netflix about their DVD business.

item.title: Beyond the Holacracy Hype
item.description:
Beyond the Holacracy Hype

Idea in Brief The Hype Holacracy and other forms of self-organization have been getting a lot of press. Proponents hail them as "flat" environments that foster flexibility, engagement, productivity, and efficiency. Critics say they're naive, unrealistic experiments. The Reality Neither view is quite right.

item.title: A Peek Inside the Moonshot Factory Operating Manual
item.description:
A Peek Inside the Moonshot Factory Operating Manual

Ever since we started as Google[x] in 2010, X has had a single mission: to invent and launch "moonshot" technologies that we hope could someday make the world a radically better place.
